usage_notes.explanation: 'Betimes' is an archaic word, meaning 'early' or 'in good time'. It is not commonly used in modern English. It is often found in older literature.

readability_explanation.text: 'Betimes' is an archaic word, rarely used in modern English. It means 'early' or 'in good time'. You are most likely to encounter it in older literature. It is not part of common vocabulary.
